description: The type of spell is always spell.
if a valid target is not included, you cannot cast the spell on that target.
Flags applicable to this entry.

valid_values.name: pain_split
valid_values.description: makes all of your limbs' damage even out.

valid_values.name: move_earth
valid_values.description: 'digs' at the target location. some terrain is not diggable this way

valid_values.name: target_attack
valid_values.description: deals damage to a target (ignores walls). If 'effect_str' is included, it will add that effect (defined elsewhere in json) to the targets if able, to the body parts defined in effected_body_parts. Any aoe will manifest as a circular area centered on the target, and will only deal damage to valid_targets. (aoe does not ignore walls)

valid_values.name: spawn_item
valid_values.description: spawns an item that will disappear at the end of its duration. Default duration is 0.

valid_values.name: line_attack
valid_values.description: fires a line with width aoe toward the target, being blocked by walls on the way. If 'effect_str' is included, it will add that effect (defined elsewhere in json) to the targets if able, to the body parts defined in effected_body_parts.
